title: GET YOUR PROGRAM CATALOG LISTED
heading: Benefits from getting your training programs listed on Laurata

benefits.description: Increased visibility for your training programs
Have your students and graduates be invited to our employment or career fairs
Bring more traffic to your web site from prospective students

odd.description: Furthermore, having your courses listed means that they will be made permanently accessible online, thereby helping to reduce inequalities in access to information (Alignment to SDG 10 of the United Nations Agenda 2030).

options.heading: HOW TO GET YOUR PROGRAMS LISTED?
items: Send your program catalog to info@laurata.com
Fill in the Excel file youâ€™ll receive from us and send it back to us.
